name: Ext_R5_ServiceRequest_reason
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.ServiceRequest.reason for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents ServiceRequest.reason from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ServiceRequest|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.definition: An explanation or justification for why this service is being requested in coded or textual form.   This is often for billing purposes.  May relate to the resources referred to in `supportingInfo`.
element.comment: `ServiceRequest.reason` maps to R4B `ServiceRequest.reasonCode`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget. `ServiceRequest.reason` maps to R4B `ServiceRequest.reasonReference`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget. `ServiceRequest.reason` maps to R4B `ServiceRequest.reasonCode`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget. `ServiceRequest.reason` maps to R4B `ServiceRequest.reasonReference`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget. `ServiceRequest.reason` maps to R4B `ServiceRequest.reasonCode`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget. `ServiceRequest.reason` maps to R4B `ServiceRequest.reasonReference`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.
